languages.text: You can find previous cues from the current dialogue by scrolling up in the dialogue window.
languages.original_text: Чтобы просмотреть предыдущие реплики диалога, промотайте его "вверх" в окне диалога.

traits.locale_text: You can find previous cues from the current dialogue by scrolling up in the dialogue window.
You can find previous cues from the current dialogue by scrolling up in the dialogue window.
You can find previous cues from the current dialogue by scrolling up in the dialogue window.

languages.text: Чтобы просмотреть предыдущие реплики диалога, промотайте его "вверх" в окне диалога.
Du findest vorherige Hinweise aus dem aktuellen Dialog, indem du im Dialogfenster nach oben scrollst.
languages.original_text: You can find previous cues from the current dialogue by scrolling up in the dialogue window.

traits.locale_text: Du findest vorherige Hinweise aus dem aktuellen Dialog, indem du im Dialogfenster nach oben scrollst.

languages.text: 你可以滚动对话窗口，从当前对话中寻找之前的提示。
languages.original_text: You can find previous cues from the current dialogue by scrolling up in the dialogue window.

traits.locale_text: 你可以滚动对话窗口，从当前对话中寻找之前的提示。

languages.text: Pour chercher des lignes passées du dialogue en cours, il suffit de remonter dans la fenêtre de dialogue.
languages.original_text: You can find previous cues from the current dialogue by scrolling up in the dialogue window.

traits.locale_text: Pour chercher des indices passés du dialogue en cours, il suffit de remonter dans la fenêtre de dialogue.
Pour chercher des indices passés du dialogue en cours, il suffit de remonter dans la fenêtre de dialogue.
Pour chercher des indices passés du dialogue en cours, il suffit de remonter dans la fenêtre de dialogue.

languages.text: Puedes buscar pistas previas del diálogo actual yendo hacia arriba en la ventana de diálogos.
languages.original_text: You can find previous cues from the current dialogue by scrolling up in the dialogue window.

traits.locale_text: Puedes buscar pistas previas del diálogo actual yendo hacia arriba en la ventana de diálogos.

languages.text: ダイアログウィンドウを上にスクロールすると、これまでのものが確認できる。
languages.original_text: You can find previous cues from the current dialogue by scrolling up in the dialogue window.

traits.locale_text: ダイアログウィンドウを上にスクロールすると、これまでのものが確認できる。

languages.text: Bir diyalog sırasında önceki konuşma satırlarına göz atmak için diyalog penceresini yukarı kaydır.
languages.original_text: You can find previous cues from the current dialogue by scrolling up in the dialogue window.
